meanings.sent1: She uptilts her head to look at the stars.
meanings.sent2: The tree uptilts towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat uptilts its chin to beg for treats.
meanings.sent4: The kite uptilts in the wind, soaring high.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower uptilts its face towards the sun for warmth.

meanings.sent1: The uptilts roof allowed rainwater to flow off easily.
meanings.sent2: The uptilts mountain peak was a challenge to climb.
meanings.sent3: The uptilts bookshelf made it hard to keep books from falling.
meanings.sent4: The uptilts tower stood out against the flat landscape.
meanings.sent5: The uptilts branches reached towards the sky, seeking sunlight.
